topic: You only have to…in order to…
sentence: You only have to ask her in order to know what has happened.

topic: You only have to…in order to…
sentence: You only have to call her in order to know whether she will come or not.

topic: You only have to…in order to…
sentence: I only have to consult the digital dictionary in order to find out the meaning of a word I don’t know.

topic: You only have to…in order to…
sentence: You only have to ask the teacher in order to solve the problem.

topic: You only have to…in order to…
sentence: You only have to get some newspapers in order to find the advertisements you need.
